about.details:
Incorporated in 2002, Rex Pipes and Cables Industries Ltd is engaged in the trading and manufacturing of PVC pipes, HDPE pipes, cables, and fittings under the "Rex" brand name. It offers a wide range of products including three core flat cables, PVC & HDPE pipes, single-core flexible home wire, HDPE and sprinklers, and cables that are used by different industries i.e. agriculture, power, construction, and engineering.

It has ultra-modern state of art manufacturing facilities in Sikar. The company further undertakes manufacturing and fabrication of bus bodies under the brand "Rex Coaches" with a total capacity of 600 buses per year. It offers distinctive types of products for the passenger transport industry i.e. city buses, school buses, intercity coaches, executive buses, commercial road container trucks, and others.

Competitive strengths

  • Rex Group of Industries is one of the leading manufacturers of PVC Pipes and fittings.
  • A prominent manufacturer of bus bodies (School buses, tourist buses, sleeper coaches, etc.).
  • Geographically diversified presence with domestic sell across different states of India and export to Nepal.
  • Diversified product portfolio and strong brand identity.
  • Strategically located manufacturing facilities.

faqs.question: What is the Rex Pipes and Cables IPO?
faqs.answer:
Rex Pipes and Cables IPO is a SME IPO of 2400000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹26 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on July 28, 2021, and closes on August 2, 2021.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Rex Pipes and Cables IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Rex Pipes and Cables IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Rex Pipes and Cables IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Rex Pipes and Cables IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Rex Pipes and Cables IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Rex Pipes and Cables IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Rex Pipes and Cables IPO opens on July 28, 2021 and closes on August 2, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Rex Pipes and Cables IPO?
faqs.answer: Rex Pipes and Cables IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,04,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Rex Pipes and Cables IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Rex Pipes and Cables IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Rex Pipes and Cables IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Rex Pipes and Cables IPO will be done on Thursday, August 5, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, August 9, 2021. Check the Rex Pipes and Cables IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Rex Pipes and Cables IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Rex Pipes and Cables IPO listing date is on Tuesday, August 10, 2021.
